jdbcService.sql: insert into component_action ( id, db_created_utc, db_modified_utc, name, display_name, icon, anchor_id, target_id, mixin, component_id ) values ( :id, timezone ('UTC', current_timestamp), timezone ('UTC', current_timestamp), :name, :displayName, :icon, :anchorId, :targetId, :mixin, :componentId )
